title: Richard Epstein on the Economics of Organ Donation
description: Richard Epstein, law professor at the University of Chicago, and Russ Roberts discuss the market for kidneys. Should people be allowed to buy and sell kidneys? How might a market for kidneys actually work in practice? Should mercenary motives be allowed to trump altruism? Epstein deals with these questions and more.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (Library of Economics and Liberty)
